name: Yacht Race
overview: The game is a yacht simulator. More precisely, the simulator of the captain of a sailing yacht. You will be gradually taught the basics of preparing a ship for sailing, laying a course, steering, working with sails and stability on the water. The game has five routes that you need to go. For each of the routes there is a map on which objects are depicted - red buoys (they must be rounded clockwise), blue buoys (they must be rounded counterclockwise), black objects (hazards - stones, trees), yellow objects (sand banks). At the first level, you will control only the steering wheel, at the second level - steering and sail, at the third level - driving, sail and balancing. In the remaining three modes - the same, only for speed with a computer opponent.
